name: Light the Lanterns
description:
A flying platformer where the goal is to find all the lanterns and light them from the inside by completing platforming challenges.

Key features:
- Flying
- Gliding
- Lovely music

This is my first attempt at creating a game project, it was completed using unity and I may expand on it in the future by adding more levels and challenge mechanics.

Available now and for free!

Contact at LightTheLanterns@hotmail.com

For feedback please leave a comment below
